question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Integration] [RuntimeEnvironment corruption] Can a corrupted RuntimeEnvironment passed to MoveVmExt::new cause downstream security vulnerabilities in session execution? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Integration] [AptosEnvironment state] Can modifications to the AptosEnvironment after MoveVmExt creation affect already-created MoveVmExt instances through shared references? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Integration] [SafeNativeBuilder vulnerabilities] Can vulnerabilities in SafeNativeBuilder's native function registration be exploited through GenesisRuntimeBuilder's usage? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Integration] [aptos_prod_vm_config bugs] Can bugs in aptos_prod_vm_config's VMConfig construction affect the security of VMs created through this file? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Integration] [aptos_natives_with_builder issues] Can the natives vector returned by aptos_natives_with_builder contain malicious or incorrectly configured natives? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Integration] [Features struct integrity] Can the Features struct from types crate be corrupted or manipulated before being used in VM initialization? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Integration] [ChainId validation] Is ChainId properly validated when passed to GenesisRuntimeBuilder::new(), or can invalid chain IDs cause security issues? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Integration] [HashValue collision] Can HashValue::zero() used as genesis_id collide with actual transaction hashes, causing session confusion? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Integration] [SessionId security] Can vulnerabilities in SessionId::genesis() enable session spoofing or privilege escalation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Edge case] [Empty resolver] Can a resolver that returns None/empty for all queries be used with new_genesis_session(), causing genesis to execute with empty state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Edge case] [Repeated genesis] Can build_genesis_vm() and new_genesis_session() be called multiple times, and if so, do they properly handle repeated genesis attempts without state corruption? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Edge case] [Zero gas with limits] What happens if genesis code tries to execute operations that would normally exceed gas limits, given that gas parameters are zero? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Edge case] [Feature flag overflow] Can enable_all() in TimedFeaturesBuilder enable more features than the Features bitset can hold, causing overflow or undefined behavior? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Edge case] [Null session ID] Can SessionId::genesis() be called with a null or invalid HashValue, and does this cause any security issues? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Edge case] [Environment destruction] What happens if the AptosEnvironment is destroyed while MoveVmExt instances cloned from it are still in use? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Edge case] [Config mutation] Can VMConfig be mutated after VM creation through its public methods, affecting already-created sessions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Edge case] [Resolver type confusion] Can different resolver types (with different state representations) be passed to new_session(), causing type confusion in SessionExt? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Edge case] [Genesis without features] What happens if Features::default() returns an empty feature set during genesis initialization? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Edge case] [Chain ID zero] Is chain_id=0 a valid value, and can it cause special-case bugs or bypass checks? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Gas] [Zero gas exploitation] Can genesis transactions exploit NativeGasParameters::zeros() to execute cryptographically expensive operations (signature verification, hashing) without cost? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Gas] [Unlimited storage abuse] Can genesis_change_set_configs() unlimited storage be abused to write gigabytes of data, exhausting validator disk space? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Gas] [Gas parameter consistency] Are zero gas parameters used consistently across all native functions during genesis, or can some natives still charge gas? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Gas] [Gas feature version downgrade] Can LATEST_GAS_FEATURE_VERSION be set to an older version to bypass gas-related security fixes? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Gas] [Post-genesis gas transition] Is there proper validation that genesis VMs cannot be used for post-genesis transactions where gas should be charged? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/vm.rs] [Resource] [Memory unbounded] Can genesis code allocate unbounded memory through large Move vectors or aggregators, crashing validators? (High)
